Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item comes with a range of features that make it stand out in its category. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than just its face value. For you, I am offering this unique product at an exclusive price of $150. It's an opportunity not to be missed. Please let me know if you're interested in making this investment. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
